name: Main Flow
info: This flow contains nodes that define the overall configuration and monitor state of the system.

name: This flow requires the node-red-dashboard module, which can be installed from the Pallete Manager

name: Format Time for Dashboard Display
Adjustments to game duration or time taken
CSS-style overrides
format:
<style>
    /* Style ON status as green */
    .sensor-status[data-status="ON"] {
    color: green !important;
    font-weight: bold;
    }
    
    /* Style OFF status as red */
    .sensor-status[data-status="OFF"] {
    color: red !important;
    font-weight: bold;
    }

    /* Don't let title expand */
    md-card md-card-title {
        flex: 0 0 auto !important;
    }

    /* Don't show scrollbars */
    .nr-dashboard-template {
        overflow-y: hidden !important;
    }

    /* Set the background color to black */
    body,
    md-content {
        background-color: black !important;
        color: white !important;
        /* Ensures text remains visible */
    }
</style>
info:
CSS Style overrides to the Node-RED Dark theme.

From the Dashboard node information panel (View->Dashboard), select
 - Site: Options -> Node-RED theme everywhere
 - Theme: Style -> Dark
